```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(dplyr)

library(haven)
load(url("https://github.com/AlvaroLimber/MD_UCB/raw/main/eh21.RData"))

library(cluster) # medoides
library(Kmedians) # medianas
library(factoextra)
library(dplyr)
inter <- eh21p %>% mutate(ihogar=(s03c_17aa == 1)) %>% mutate(jefe = (s01a_05 == 1)) %>% group_by( s01a_02) %>%
    filter(jefe == T) %>% select (  s01a_02)#jefe, folio, ihogar, s01a_02 
table(inter)
bds<-scale(inter)

#factores: campo-ciudad   ganancias    edad     tipo de casa? 



#set.seed(824)
m1<-kmeans(bds,2)# comando de origen
m1
m1$centers
m1$cluster

table(kmeans(bds,2)$cluster)





```
